docs.snippet: The Jets became the fourth N.F.L. team to be sued by their cheerleaders for back wages....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Jets became the fourth N.F.L. team to be sued by their cheerleaders for back wages.
docs.abstract: New York Jets become fourth NFL team to be sued by their cheerleaders for back wages; Krystal C, former member of the Flight Crew, files class-action complaint accusing team of failing to pay her for mandatory practices and appearances, or reimburse her for a host of work-related expenses.

docs.snippet: The World Cup is around the corner and millions of fans are putting down their iPads to collect and trade football stickers, a decades-old hobby that has defied the digital age....

docs.snippet: Italy's Serie A football clubs have signed a contract with Swiss-based agency Infront that guarantees them at least 6 billion euros (£4.95 billion) in income from television rights for the next six seasons, Infront said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's Serie A football clubs have signed a contract with Swiss-based agency Infront that guarantees them at least 6 billion euros (£4.95 billion) in income from television rights for the next six seasons, Infront said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Italian Football Clubs Sign 6 Billion Euro Television Deal
headline.print_headline: Italian Football Clubs Sign 6 Billion Euro Television Deal

docs.snippet: Villarreal have been fined 12,000 euros (9,847 pounds) by the Spanish football federation after a fan threw a banana at Barcelona's Dani Alves during last month's La Liga match at El Madrigal, the club said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Villarreal have been fined 12,000 euros (9,847 pounds) by the Spanish football federation after a fan threw a banana at Barcelona's Dani Alves during last month's La Liga match at El Madrigal, the club said on Wednesday.

docs.snippet: Swansea City manager Garry Monk intends to "stamp his authority" on the Welsh side after his position was made permanent by the Premier League club on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: Richard Sherman, the brash and outspoken defender for the Seattle Seahawks, became the National Football League's highest paid cornerback after signing a four year $57.4 million contract extension, the team said on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: In a story May 7 about the trial of former University of Georgia coach Jim Donnan, The Associated Press reported erroneously the hometown of retired ESPN executive Daniel Shoemaker. He is from Huntington, West Virginia, not Huntsville....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story May 7 about the trial of former University of Georgia coach Jim Donnan, The Associated Press reported erroneously the hometown of retired ESPN executive Daniel Shoemaker. He is from Huntington, West Virginia, not Huntsville.
